hero.title: Get Your NSDEV ACCOUNT Now!
hero.subtitle: Easily and quickly obtain your developer account. Bring your projects to life, introduce your applications to the world. We are with you with our reliable and fast service.

feature1.title: Easy Access
feature1.description: With the account you purchase, you can easily access the developer portal and request help with projects.

feature2.title: Reliable Service

feature3.title: Support Line

about.title: NSDEV ACCOUNT
about.subtitle: Premium Developer Accounts
about.description2: We have been actively selling developer accounts for four years. Our accounts are available in various countries and are offered to you with our quality and secure service understanding. You can contact us for detailed information and to benefit from our services.

products.title: Develop Products and Contribute to the Community!
products.subtitle: We support you in acquiring an account for the Developer Program and being present in the developer environment.

product1.title: Developer Account
product1.description: By acquiring the account you need, you can contribute to the development environment and help many projects succeed.

product2.title: Developer Portal
product2.description: Join the Developer Program to help develop amazing applications for iPhone, iPad, Mac, Apple Watch, and Apple TV.

product3.title: Development Tools
product3.description: Access all the tools and resources you need to create great applications and contribute to the developer community.

howToOrder.title: How Can I Order?
howToOrder.subtitle: Complete the relevant steps to get your Developer Account in a short time!

step1.title: Create Order
step1.description: Developers who want to purchase an account contact us by clicking on the links on our site.

step2.title: Account Selection
step2.description: After contacting, they specify the details of the developer account to be purchased.

step3.title: Payment
step3.description: Payment for the relevant order is made to the specified account. The payment receipt must be sent to us.

step4.title: Delivery
step4.description: The necessary configurations are made for the requested account and your order is activated. Account information is sent to you.

question1.title: What is a Developer Account?
question1.answer: A Developer Account is an account created for developers who want to develop applications for platforms and publish these applications on the App Store. This account facilitates the application development process by providing developers with various tools and resources.

question2.title: Which Countries Can I Choose When Purchasing an Account?
question2.answer: Developer Account can be used in many countries around the world. We offer accounts from various regions to meet your specific needs.

question3.title: When Can I Receive My Order?
question3.answer: You can securely obtain your Developer Account within minutes after the order is created.

cta.title: Ready to Start Developing?
cta.subtitle: Get your Developer Account today and join the community of innovative developers from around the world.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Most frequently asked questions about developer accounts

q1.question: What is a Developer Account?
q1.answer: A Developer Account is an account created for developers who want to develop applications for platforms and publish these applications on the App Store. This account facilitates the application development process by providing developers with various tools and resources.

q2.question: Which Countries Can I Choose When Purchasing an Account?
q2.answer: Developer Account can be used in many countries around the world. We offer accounts from various regions to meet your specific needs.

q3.question: When Can I Receive My Order?
q3.answer: You can securely obtain your Developer Account within minutes after the order is created.

q4.question: Which Payment Methods Do You Accept?
q4.answer: We accept bank transfers, cryptocurrencies, and other popular payment methods. Please contact us for detailed information.

q5.question: What Should I Do If I Have Issues With My Account?
q5.answer: If you experience any issues with your account, you can reach our 24/7 support team via WhatsApp, Telegram, or our other communication channels.

q6.question: How Long Will My Account Be Valid?
q6.answer: Developer accounts are generally valid for one year and need to be renewed annually. We will send you a reminder for the renewal process.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our services

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.content: Welcome to NSDEV ACCOUNT ("we," "our," or "us"). These Terms and Conditions ("Terms") govern your access to and use of our website, products, and services. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms.

services.title: 2. Services Description
services.content: NSDEV ACCOUNT provides developer accounts and related services. Our services include but are not limited to:
items: Technical support related to account usage
services.additional: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any part of our services at any time without notice.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: How we collect, use, and protect your personal information

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.content: At NSDEV ACCOUNT ("we," "our," or "us"), we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or use our services.
intro.additional: Please read this Privacy Policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this Privacy Policy, please do not access the site or use our services.

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
personalInfo.content: We may collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you:
items: Contact us through our website or messaging platforms
personalInfo.additional: The personal information we may collect includes:
